learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: e.g. calculate with: hourly rates of pay, exchange rates between currencies, flow rates, fuel consumption.
e.g. calculate with: pressure, density, population density. Required formulas will be given in the question.

Knowledge of speed/distance/time formula is required. e.g. A cyclist travels 45 km in 3 hours 45 minutes. What is their average speed? The notation used for rates will be in the form, e.g. m/s (metres per second), g/cmÂ³ (grams per cubic centimetre).
